TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPostBackContainer

summary.span: 定義方法，以允許控制項取得用戶端指令碼選項。

span.span: Defines a method that enables controls to obtain client-side script options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可實作介面啟用按鈕，以取得用來建立正確的回傳事件參考的物件。Classes that implement the interface enable buttons to get a object that is used to create the correct postback event reference. 如需回傳處理的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 伺服器控制項事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information about postback processing, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). 控制可實作也應該實作介面介面，以處理內含的按鈕所引發的事件。Controls that implement the interface should also implement the interface to handle events raised by contained buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl buttonControl) cil managed
Public Function GetPostBackOptions (buttonControl As IButtonControl) As PostBackOptions

param.name: buttonControl
param.span: 產生回傳事件的控制項。

span.span: The control generating the postback event.

summary.span: 傳回指定之按鈕控制項回傳指令碼的必要選項。

span.span: Returns the options required for a postback script for a specified button control.

returns.span: 物件，包含產生 之回傳指令碼的必要選項。

span.span: A object containing the options required to generate a postback script for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法應該設定新的執行個體所需的資訊與方法來建構有效的回傳事件的參考，當用戶端上執行，會起始回傳。Implementations of the method should configure a new instance with the information required for the method to construct a valid postback event reference, which, when executed on the client, initiates a postback.
